I am an economic researcher and trained data scientist with a MSc degree in Data Science for Public Policy from the Hertie School of Governance in Berlin. I have over five years of professional experience in data analysis and quantitative research. My recent work focuses on applications of Natural Language Processing in development and competition policy.
